title: Grand Reopening: Napa Valley Indulgence with US$100 Spa Credit, Daily US$40 Dining Credit & Wine Tasting
description:
Immerse yourself in luxury at Napa Valley's largest resort, nestled among sun-drenched vineyards and rolling golden hills. Following a multi-year US$25 million transformation, the 36-acre property boasts nine acres of active vineyards, stunning Spanish Mission-style architecture and rooms featuring custom furnishings with charming rustic touches.

Elevate the romance at the adults-only pool with views of the surrounding vines, unwind at the family-friendly pool or rejuvenate with treatments at Spa Terra. Savour prime cuts at Ember Steak, enjoy farm-to-table Italian cuisine at Olive & Hay, sip handcrafted cocktails at the Commons Bar and raise a glass of champagne at the intimate Sora lounge.

title: Lavish Napa Valley Vineyard Retreat with Fine-Dining Restaurant & Spa
description: Stay in the epitome of Californian elegance at The Meritage Resort and Spa, a sumptuous sanctuary nestled amidst the world-renowned grapevines of the Napa Valley. This exclusive haven boasts an onsite spa, a fine-dining restaurant serving delectable farm-to-table cuisine, and a chic bowling alley for a touch of playful luxury. Venture out to explore the picturesque wine trails, basking in the beauty of the surrounding vineyards, and indulge in a sunset dinner with panoramic views of the Napa Valley.
offer_address: 875 Bordeaux Way, Napa, California 94558, United States
